snippet: The Mike’s Hard Lemonade line of malt beverages is introducing a series of humorous commercials that begin the same way but then diverge to offer different endings.
abstract: Stuart Elliott Advertising column notes the Mike’s Hard Lemonade line of malt beverages is introducing a series of humorous commercials.
lead_paragraph: The Mike’s Hard Lemonade line of malt beverages is introducing a series of humorous commercials that begin the same way but then diverge to offer different endings.

headline.seo: To Keep Viewers Watching, New Ads Come With Varied Endings
headline.main: To Keep Viewers Watching, New Ads Come With Varied Endings
headline.print_headline: To Keep Viewers Watching, New Ads Come With Varied Endings
